sentences.en: A third name for the 25 th is Grotto Day.
sentences.cn: 7月25日的第三个名字叫“神龛日”.

sentences.en: And it was said that unproductive women can get pregnant, after washing in the grotto.
sentences.cn: 据传达室久未怀孕的妇女沐浴洞中,亦可孕育生命, 洋溢活力.

sentences.en: Because Dunhuang Grotto locates the Gobi area havingatrOcious weather, muras are threatened andtO be very frail.
sentences.cn: 然而, 由于自然风化的破坏以及重大自然灾害的威胁,这个人类艺术的宝库变得非常脆弱.

sentences.en: Franz took the lamp , and entered the subterranean grotto, followed by Gaetano.
sentences.cn: 弗兰兹拿着火把走进了地下岩洞, 后面跟着盖太诺.

sentences.en: He smiled, and introduced them instantly into this " grotto. "
sentences.cn: 他微微笑了一下, 立刻引她们到 “ 石洞 ” 去.

sentences.en: Here is the most eye - catching Binglingsi Grotto.
sentences.cn: 这里最引人注目的就是炳灵寺石窟.

sentences.en: I swam slowly back to my grotto and slept for the rest of that day.
sentences.cn: 余游慢慢回到我的山洞和睡觉,其余的那一天.

sentences.en: Jing Sichuan is the sister Grotto Cave Temple, the importance of the Silk Road grottoes north.
sentences.cn: 是泾川南石窟寺的姊妹窟, 丝路北道上的重要石窟.

sentences.en: Longshan Grottoes Taoism is China's largest grotto, Chuan experts in the world.
sentences.cn: 龙山石窟是我国最大的道教石窟, 被专家传为世界之最.

sentences.en: Luigi took her arm beneath his own, and led her to the door of the grotto.
sentences.cn: 罗吉挽住她的手臂, 领她到地洞门口,停下来.

sentences.en: Out of devotion, pilgrims used to take meals in the grotto.
sentences.cn: 虔诚的朝圣者们在洞穴中用餐.

sentences.en: The cry proceeded from the grotto.
sentences.cn: 那声音是从地洞那面传过来的.

sentences.en: The obliteration of the grotto was not only possible, but relatively easy.
sentences.cn: 摧毁山洞不但可能, 而且易如反掌.

sentences.en: The Qianfeyan ( thousand - Buddha crags ) Grotto , located in Jingxing County of Hebei Province, is level key cultural relic preservation.
sentences.cn: 千佛岩石窟位于河北省井陉县, 是省级重点文物保护单位.

sentences.en: Water trickles through an underground grotto.

trans.tran_cn: （吸引人的）岩洞，洞穴，（人挖的）洞室
